dmca.title: FW: [EV1-C2385621T] warez
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Otto Frank [mailto:ottofrank25@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 02, 2007 2:50 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C2385621T] warez


Dear Sir or Madam:
 
I take it then that the domain is still using your services.  Therefore,
it is now understood that the planet network does indeed condone the use
of it's services to promote illegal activity.  This information will be
listed on the Internet to warn any others that may think of utilizing
your services. 
 
It is a shame that hosts such as yours turn their heads on the promotion
of illegal activity.

DMCA <dmca@theplanet.com> wrote:

does not
